channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: GloBE Information Return (Pillar Two) XML Schema - User Guide for Tax Administrations
item.description: GloBE Information Return (Pillar Two) XML Schema - User Guide for Tax Administrations by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Monday 13 January 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – Consolidated Commentary to the Global Anti-Base Erosion Model Rules (2024) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS
item.description: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – Consolidated Commentary to the Global Anti-Base Erosion Model Rules (2024) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Monday 13 January 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – GloBE Information Return (January 2025) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS
item.description: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – GloBE Information Return (January 2025) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Monday 13 January 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Chile 2025
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Chile 2025 by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday 15 January 2025 at 11:00.

item.title: OECD Economics Survey: Ireland 2025
item.description: OECD Economics Survey: Ireland 2025 by Economics Department has an embargo on Monday 27 January 2025 at 10:00.

item.title: Transforming Catalonia’s Mobility System for Net Zero
item.description: Transforming Catalonia’s Mobility System for Net Zero by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 28 January 2025 at 9:10.
